short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to use a custom Google shopping search to see what is available through stores in partnership with Amway co.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy to use and simple extension to help IBOs to get the most volume out of the partnerships the American Way corporation holds with fortune 500 and other retail companies.

 • Just click the extension icon in your chrome bar to load a custom Google shopping search
 • The new page loaded will only show results for partner stores! 
 • Look for AmPartnerStore below the Google logo to ensure you're in the custom search.

If you press the "CLEAR" button in the Seller subsection, it will clear all the partner stores from the current search, however, the "AmPartnerSearch" text below the Google logo will not disappear.

*Not all items shown are eligible for volume; you must look at the specific partner store's agreement with American Way corporation for details.
**This extension is independent and not associated with the Amway corporation.
